errors.error_description: Instructions suggest installing bw2io before creating and activating the virtual environment, which is incorrect order
correction_candidates: python -m venv myenv && source myenv/bin/activate && pip install bw2io
First create virtual environment with python -m venv myenv, then activate with source myenv/bin/activate, finally install with pip install bw2io
Create and activate virtual environment first: python -m venv myenv && source myenv/bin/activate, then install bw2io
Set up virtual environment (python -m venv myenv && source myenv/bin/activate) before installing bw2io
errors.golden_answer: python -m venv myenv && source myenv/bin/activate && pip install bw2io

errors.error_description: States the package requires Python 2.7 which is outdated and incorrect for modern brightway2-io
correction_candidates: The package requires Python 3.8 or later for optimal performance
The package requires Python 3.7+ for optimal performance
The package requires Python 3.6 or later for optimal performance
The package requires Python 3.9 or later for optimal performance
errors.golden_answer: The package requires Python 3.8 or later for optimal performance
